Prodcuto Precio Unitario Cantidad Imagen Totales
{{product.product ? formatPrice(product.product!.unitPrice): 0}} {{formatPrice(product.total)}}
Sub total {{formatPrice(calculateSubtotal())}}
Impuestos (19%) {{formatPrice(calculateTaxes())}}
Total {{formatPrice(calculateTotal())}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-invoice-component', templateUrl: './search-invoice.component.html' }) export class SearchInvoiceComponent { public currentCount = 0; public incrementCounter() { this.currentCount++; } }
